body:
**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?**:

@kubernetes/sig-api-machinery-bugs 

**What happened**:

```
$ go tool pprof -seconds 60 http://localhost:8080/debug/pprof/profile
Fetching profile over HTTP from http://localhost:8080/debug/pprof/profile?seconds=60
Please wait... (1m0s)
http://localhost:8080/debug/pprof/profile: server response: 504 Gateway Timeout
failed to fetch any profiles
```

In the log:

```
I1229 14:09:18.457813       7 wrap.go:42] GET /debug/pprof/profile?seconds=60: (1m0.000299116s) 504
goroutine 9131335737 [running]:
k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apiserver/pkg/server/httplog.(*respLogger).recordStatus(0xc479891180, 0x1f8)
        /go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apiserver/pkg/server/httplog/httplog.go:207 +0xdd
k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apiserver/pkg/server/httplog.(*respLogger).WriteHeader(0xc479891180, 0x1f8)
        /go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apiserver/pkg/server/httplog/httplog.go:186 +0x35
k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apiserver/pkg/server/filters.(*baseTimeoutWriter).timeout(0xc523c9e080, 0xc47e3a86c0)
        /go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apiserver/pkg/server/filters/timeout.go:201 +0xb3
k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apiserver/pkg/server/filters.(*timeoutHandler).ServeHTTP(0xc426088c40, 0x8e482e0, 0xc479891180, 0xc458213300)
        /go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apiserver/pkg/server/filters/timeout.go:101 +0x292
k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apiserver/pkg/server/filters.WithMaxInFlightLimit.func1(0x8e482e0, 0xc479891180, 0xc458213300)
        /go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apiserver/pkg/server/filters/maxinflight.go:95 +0x318
net/http.HandlerFunc.ServeHTTP(0xc42c69d580, 0x8e482e0, 0xc479891180, 0xc458213300)
        /usr/local/go/src/net/http/server.go:1918 +0x44
k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apiserver/pkg/server/filters.WithWaitGroup.func1(0x8e482e0, 0xc479891180, 0xc458213300)
        /go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apiserver/pkg/server/filters/waitgroup.go:51 +0xeb
net/http.HandlerFunc.ServeHTTP(0xc42c69d640, 0x8e482e0, 0xc479891180, 0xc458213300)
        /usr/local/go/src/net/http/server.go:1918 +0x44
k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apiserver/pkg/endpoints/filters.WithRequestInfo.func1(0x8e482e0, 0xc479891180, 0xc458213300)
        /go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apiserver/pkg/endpoints/filters/requestinfo.go:45 +0x20f
net/http.HandlerFunc.ServeHTTP(0xc42c69d680, 0x8e482e0, 0xc479891180, 0xc458213300)
        /usr/local/go/src/net/http/server.go:1918 +0x44
k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apiserver/pkg/endpoints/request.WithRequestContext.func1(0x8e482e0, 0xc479891180, 0xc458213300)
        /go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apiserver/pkg/endpoints/request/requestcontext.go:110 +0xcb
net/http.HandlerFunc.ServeHTTP(0xc426088cc0, 0x8e482e0, 0xc479891180, 0xc458213300)
        /usr/local/go/src/net/http/server.go:1918 +0x44
k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apiserver/pkg/server/filters.WithPanicRecovery.func1(0x8e482e0, 0xc479891180, 0xc458213300)
        /go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/k8s.io/apiserver/pkg/server/filters/wrap.go:41 +0x108
net/http.HandlerFunc.ServeHTTP(0xc426088ce0, 0x8e491a0, 0xc567956380, 0xc458213300)
        /usr/local/go/src/net/http/server.go:1918 +0x44
net/http.serverHandler.ServeHTTP(0xc4270a4ea0, 0x8e491a0, 0xc567956380, 0xc458213300)
        /usr/local/go/src/net/http/server.go:2619 +0xb4
net/http.(*conn).serve(0xc64386ee60, 0x8e4b6a0, 0xc5976fc2c0)
        /usr/local/go/src/net/http/server.go:1801 +0x71d
created by net/http.(*Server).Serve
        /usr/local/go/src/net/http/server.go:2720 +0x288

logging error output: "{\"metadata\":{},\"status\":\"Failure\",\"message\":\"Timeout: request did not complete within 1m0s\",\"reason\":\"Timeout\",\"details\":{},\"code\":504}\n"
 [[Go-http-client/1.1] 127.0.0.1:34084]
```

**What you expected to happen**:

The timeout should be more relaxed on /debug/pprof endpoints.

**How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**:

```
go tool pprof -seconds 60 http://localhost:8080/debug/pprof/profile
```

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.
labels.name: kind/bug

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG API Machinery.
labels.name: sig/api-machinery

title: attempt to collect a long profiler sample from apiserver is aborted
